name: Sticker Simulator
description:
Created for JDE's Frost Jam, have a relaxing time by placing down stickers on multiple surfaces. 

Created by:

Kailey Phan Mitchell- Artist/ Designer

Eric Moen- Sound Designer

Zac Mascarenas- Programmer

David Dougherty- Programmer

Controls:

Left Click To Pick Up Sticker

Release Left Click to Place Sticker

Scroll Wheel to Resize Sticker

Right Click to Change Sticker Surface

R to change radio station

Soundtrack:
